description.value: Your soul is especially able to return to the cycle of reincarnation. When you're the subject of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Raise Dead], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Reincarnate], or a similar ritual that would return you to life, the primary caster uses the outcome one degree of success better than their roll. You always return to life as a samsaran, even if the ritual would reincarnate you into a body of a different ancestry.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
